description.value:
The arcanist can attempt to counter a primal magic event as if counterspelling a magical effect. This requires a Spellcraft check with a DC of 10 + the CR of the primal magic event. If she succeeds, the event is dispelled per @Compendium[pf1.spells.gmgwyjfpeuuc4t4o]{Dispel Magic}.

The arcanist must have the counterspell exploit to select this exploit.
